subject: AI & Agents
title: Dual Use: When Helpful Tools Cause Harm
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Dual Use: When Helpful Tools Cause Harm.

hook.text: A chemistry AI helps researchers discover drugs. It also suggests nerve agents.

buildup.text: Dual-use means the same capability can serve benign or malicious purposes.

discovery.text: Code generation helps developers but also generates malware. Translation aids but also enables scams.

twist.text: Restricting capabilities too much kills legitimate use. Too little invites abuse.

climax.text: Risk assessment, usage monitoring, and graduated access help balance openness and safety.

punchline.text: Every powerful tool is a dual-use tool.

quiz.question: What does dual-use mean in AI?
